comment: There are teachers that try to teach and there is this teacher that was born to teach. She made Econ 3300 very easy to understand where other teachers make it impossible. Her grading criteria are straight forward. All the information you need is gives in class and optional homework and extra credit is available. The Worlds best teacher! Take her !
Great Professor, and she actually cares to see her students succeed. I would recommend her anyone!
Dr. Bartlett, she's amazing, easy to understand. 3 tests, get a cheat sheet. Don't need the book, gives hand outs that explain everything to a tea.

I was a little unsure of how well I would do in this class before taking. However, professor Bartlett explains things so well and in depth. I wish I would have had the chance to take her for both Stats classes. Sad that she is leaving after one year. Recommend!

She is very clear and direct of what she wants from you. She adjusts the material if her class needs to move slower or faster. 3 tests and a final, only the top 3 test grades count. Group project that is super easy. Strongly suggests. Knows what she is talking about. Gives hand outs, and practice tests. Test are basically the practice tests.
Great teacher. I would take her as many times as possible for the rest of my college career.

Great professor. Makes a hard subject seem easy and her teaching methods are clearly geared to the current generation of students. Extremely nice and understanding. She grades a bit harshly but the tests are very fair and she lets you take the final as an option to drop the lowest test grade. Probably the best App Stat professor at Kennesaw.
